title: StreetsP9
author: StreetsP9
content: Hi, We are building a project where we are using Google BigQuery to source Bitcoin data for website time series charts. We are sourcing raw Bitcoin data from Big Query and that then supplies data via pipelines for our data schemas python code for each chart in our Google Cloud account.We are looking for someone with Bitcoin data and Big Query engineering experience to help us complete the project.We do NOT need your help building the charts. We just need you to manipulate and pull the data from BigQuery, then create the data tables for us to pull data from for our data schemas.We will provide specific briefings on the data schemas we want you to create once you submit your interest in the job but they are like the example above.More detail will be shared once you provide us with your experience.Thanks
